short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch what you want to watch with no distractions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Focus mode for Youtube that hides unwanted videos and distracting content.

Focus on watching what you want to watch on Youtube and not get distracted from the tempting recommended videos/content.
